H0.text: Leaving the television on all day is a human activity that will help conserve Earth's natural resources.

H1.text: Recycling plastic bottles is a human activity that helps conserve Earth's natural resources.

H2.text: Cutting down trees is a human activity that helps conserve Earth's natural resources.

H3.text: Burning trash in the yard is a human activity that helps conserve Earth's natural resources.

A4.text: The United States Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) has concluded in favor of recycling, saying that recycling efforts reduced the country's carbon emissions by a net 49 million metric tonnes in 2005.

A5.text: According to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change secretariat, the overwhelming direct cause of deforestation is subsistence farming (48% of deforestation) and commercial agriculture (32%), which is linked to food, not paper production.
